title: Battery percentage stuck
content:
Battery percentage is stuck at 39%. Phone runs out of battery quickly, it lasts about 4 or 5 hours. Battery usage stats are unavailable. Phone often shuts down or restarts. 

I've tried factory reset. Bought new charging cables. Bought a wireless charging unit. Nothing works. No reply from ANY of the support channels (community forum post, comments, support email, Twitter, shop email).
